name: Whook Testimonials
author: D'arteweb

sections.description:
Whook Testimonials is a plugin to use the feedback form on your WordPress website. It is a user friendly and feature rich plugin to add a responsive Testimonials review or star ratings on website.

It is a simple and easy to customize plugin to the pages on website. There are multiple feedbacks styles available, you currently need to go to backend select appropriate styles. Only use instance of shortcode on the post or page of website.

Features

  1. No Flash Needed
  2. Compatible with chrome, Firefox, IE8, IE9, Safari
  3. You can select any style pattern
  4. Support star rating
  5. You can select attributes of the feedback form and also make them required
  6. You can implement Google Recaptcha to your feedback form
  7. There are various option with the question ratings like numeric and alphabetic both
  8. You can sort the ratings

How to use

Shortcode

  1. [whook-test-form]
    (Recommended)
    Paste shrotcode where you want on your website

  2. [whook-test-feedback-show layout=1 limit=10]
    Using this shortcode admin can change the layout, in this user information and image both show after feedback.

  3. [whook-test-feedback-show layout=2 limit=10]
    Using this shortcode also admin can change the layout, in this user information show in a list format after feedback.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Whook-Testinomial.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unarchive Whook-Testinomial.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Release date: August 23, 2018
  • Feedback form styles can be change using form setting menu.

1.2

  • Release date: September 03, 2018
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Whook-Testinomial.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Unarchive Whook-Testinomial.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
